summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 CHEVROLET MALIBU.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE POWER STEERING WOULD DEACTIVE WHILE THE VEHICLE IS IN MOTION.  THE DEALER WAS NOTIFIED, BUT DID NOT DIAGNOSE THE FAILURE.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE.  THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 92,850 AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 93,000.
